title: Boundary representations of hyperbolic groups: the log-Sobolev case
abstract:
We study boundary representations of hyperbolic groups $\Gamma$ on the
(compactly embedded) function space $W^{\log,2}(\partial\Gamma)\subset
L^2(\partial\Gamma)$, the domain of the logarithmic Laplacian on
$\partial\Gamma$. We show that they are not uniformly bounded, and establish
their exact growth (up a multiplicative constant): they grow with the square
root of the length of $g\in\Gamma$. We also obtain $L^p$--analogue of this
result. Our main tool is a logarithmic Sobolev inequality on bounded
Ahlfors--David regular metric measure spaces.
